I recommend 'Reservoir Dogs' (1992). This crime thriller, directed by Quentin Tarantino and starring an ensemble cast including Michael Madsen and Chris Penn, follows a group of criminals who attempt a jewelry heist but encounter unexpected complications.

'The Expendables 2' is also an interesting choice if you enjoy action-packed films with a focus on nostalgia.
